definition: Being managed successfully; not out of hand.
example: The situation is under control.
example_translation: Sytuacja jest pod kontrolą.

definition: Despite the fact that; even though.
example: Although it was raining, we went for a walk.
example_translation: Chociaż padał deszcz, poszliśmy na spacer.

definition: Current, modern, or containing the latest information.
example: The information is up to date.
example_translation: Informacje są aktualne.

definition: An improvement or positive adjustment.
example: The new policy is a change for the better.
example_translation: Nowa polityka to zmiana na lepsze.

definition: Being thought about or discussed.
example: The proposal is under consideration.
example_translation: Wniosek jest rozważany.

definition: To be included in or classified as.
example: This behavior comes under the definition of misconduct.
example_translation: To zachowanie podlega definicji niewłaściwego postępowania.

definition: Used to show a difference between two things.
example: In contrast to his brother, he is very outgoing.
example_translation: W przeciwieństwie do swojego brata, jest bardzo towarzyski.

definition: Lower than a specified standard or point.
example: The temperature fell below this level.
example_translation: Temperatura spadła poniżej tego poziomu.

definition: Approximately 85,000.
example: The population is at about 85,000.
example_translation: Populacja wynosi ok. 85 tys.

definition: To appear or give the impression of being in a particular state or place.
example: She seems in good spirits today.
example_translation: Wydaje się być dzisiaj w dobrym nastroju.

definition: Not under management or regulation; chaotic.
example: The fire quickly got out of control.
example_translation: Pożar szybko wymknął się spod kontroli.

definition: Referring to a specific time or situation.
example: As at that point, there were no further updates.
example_translation: Jak w tym momencie, nie było dalszych aktualizacji.

definition: In a state of stress or anxiety because of having too much to do.
example: She works well under pressure.
example_translation: Dobrze pracuje pod presją.

definition: Needed or wanted by many people.
example: Electric cars are in demand.
example_translation: Samochody elektryczne są w popycie.

definition: In reality, as opposed to theory.
example: The solution works in practice.
example_translation: Rozwiązanie działa w praktyce.

definition: Requiring something that is essential or necessary.
example: The school is in need of more teachers.
example_translation: Szkoła potrzebuje więcej nauczycieli.

definition: Usually, mainly, or for the most part.
example: In general, people are satisfied with the service.
example_translation: Ogólnie ludzie są zadowoleni z obsługi.

definition: According to the regulations or laws.
example: Under the rules, you must wear a helmet.
example_translation: Zgodnie z zasadami, musisz nosić kask.

definition: With all the particulars and specifics.
example: He explained the process in detail.
example_translation: Szczegółowo wyjaśnił proces.

definition: Typically or usually; based on an average.
example: On average, students spend 3 hours on homework.
example_translation: Średnio uczniowie spędzają 3 godziny na pracach domowych.

definition: As well; also.
example: In addition to his salary, he receives bonuses.
example_translation: Oprócz pensji otrzymuje premie.

definition: To think about something in a particular way.
example: She is considered to be an expert in her field.
example_translation: Uważana jest za ekspertkę w swojej dziedzinie.

definition: Intentionally; not by accident.
example: He did it on purpose to annoy her.
example_translation: Zrobił to celowo, aby ją zirytować.

definition: Not required to do something.
example: You are under no obligation to buy anything.
example_translation: Nie masz obowiązku niczego kupować.

definition: Not at all; definitely not.
example: By no means is this project complete.
example_translation: W żadnym wypadku ten projekt nie jest ukończony.

definition: In water that is not salty.
example: These fish thrive in freshwater.
example_translation: Te ryby rozwijają się w wodach słodkich.

definition: In the northern part of the Atlantic Ocean.
example: They sailed on the North Atlantic.
example_translation: Płynęli po północnym Atlantyku.

definition: Within the watercourses of rivers.
example: Salmon spawn in rivers.
example_translation: Łososie składają ikrę w rzekach.

definition: Going on a journey to a specific place.
example: They are travelling to Paris.
example_translation: Podróżują do Paryża.

definition: Located at a great distance from the sea.
example: The village is far away from the sea.
example_translation: Wioska jest daleko od morza.

definition: Returning to a place previously left.
example: We are travelling back to our hometown.
example_translation: Podróżujemy z powrotem do naszego rodzinnego miasta.

definition: A sign indicating the direction or distance to Albury.
example: Follow the sign to Albury.
example_translation: Podążaj za znakiem do Albury.

definition: Located at the conclusion of a path, list, or sequence.
example: The treasure was found at the end of the cave.
example_translation: Skarb został znaleziony na końcu jaskini.

word: The village on the right opposite
definition: A village located directly across from something on the right side.
example: You will see the village on the right opposite the forest.
example_translation: Zobaczysz wioskę po prawej stronie naprzeciwko lasu.

definition: Next to the railway track.
example: The house is located beside the railway.
example_translation: Dom znajduje się obok linii kolejowej.

word: Passes through a tunnel beneath the motorway
definition: Moves through a tunnel located under a motorway.
example: The train passes through a tunnel beneath the motorway.
example_translation: Pociąg przejeżdża przez tunel pod autostradą.

word: Go down the steps on the right
translation: zejście po schodach po prawej stronie
definition: Descend the staircase located to the right.
example: Go down the steps on the right to reach the basement.
example_translation: Zejdź po schodach po prawej stronie, aby dotrzeć do piwnicy.

definition: Moves in a circular path around something.
example: The bird circles round the tree.
example_translation: Ptak krąży dookoła drzewa.

definition: To arrive at the side of the river.
example: They walked until they came to the river bank.
example_translation: Szli, aż dotarli do brzegu rzeki.

definition: A map that shows the location or area being referred to.
example: Check the map at this point to see where we are.
example_translation: Sprawdź mapę w tym miejscu, aby zobaczyć, gdzie jesteśmy.

definition: Currently being built in different locations.
example: New buildings are under construction in various parts of the city.
example_translation: Nowe budynki są w budowie w różnych częściach miasta.

definition: Located within the mentioned towns.
example: There are many historical sites in these towns.
example_translation: W tych miastach jest wiele zabytków.

definition: Including the following.
example: There are several projects, among which will be the new park.
example_translation: Jest kilka projektów, wśród których będzie nowy park.

definition: A modern electric meter installed in every household.
example: A smart meter in each house helps monitor energy consumption.
example_translation: Inteligentny licznik w każdym domu pomaga monitorować zużycie energii.

definition: Located close by; not far away.
example: The store is within a short distance from my house.
example_translation: Sklep znajduje się w niewielkiej odległości od mojego domu.

definition: To ride a bicycle to one’s place of employment.
example: Many people in the city cycle to work.
example_translation: Wiele osób w mieście jeździ rowerem do pracy.

definition: Can be found or obtained in a specific place or form.
example: The product is available in several colors.
example_translation: Produkt jest dostępny w kilku kolorach.

definition: Using solar energy in addition to traditional energy sources.
example: The new building uses solar power alongside conventional energy.
example_translation: Nowy budynek korzysta z energii słonecznej obok energii konwencjonalnej.
